cab.content: His Britannic Majesty's Government.) a . h i.(This Document is the Property of3 Whitehall Court,Russian Embassy.S.W. 1.9 th February.Dear Colonel Buckley, It has come to my knowledge that the man Litvinoffreceives at his premises, 82 Victoria Street, Russian sailorsand soldiers, also Russians serving in the British andCanadian Forces and trying to impress them with his"ambassadorial" dignity, explains to them that they neednot obey their officers as officers' rank is abolished.Shis speaks for itself.Yours truly,(signed) II. Yermoloff,Lieut-General.
